• Second Read
  • Projects
  • Bio
NewsGrid

An ongoing, personal project building on computational linguistics and data visualization to communicate and explore complex
news topics. Supported by a JSK Fellowship from Stanford University

CartoDB

I was in the team launching and developing this open source mapping platform. CartoDB was a finalist at the 2012 Online News Association Journalism Awards as a Technical Innovation in the Service of Digital Journalism.

porCausa

A non-profit news organization producing long-term journalism projects on poverty and social inequalities in collaboration with media
organizations in Europe, US and Latin America

Teaching

I am a lecturer on journalism, mapping and digital tools for communication at the Knight Center for Journalism in the Americas (University of Texas in Austin),
the IE Business School (Madrid, Spain), and Universidad de La Sabana (Colombia)

Research

I am a member of the Social and Cardiovascular Epidemiology Group from the Universidad de Alcala (Madrid, Spain), composed by a multidisciplinary team of people devoted to health research
